tool_description: This API Helps Query Black Clover Characters Names , Avatars etc.
title: Black Clover Characters

api_list.name: Get Individual Character Info
api_list.description: Get Individual Character Info like species, ,magic attribute , age, birthday and others
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://black-clover-characters.p.rapidapi.com/c/{nameid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "black-clover-characters.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Black Clover Characters
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all my black clover characters from my hero academia series.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://black-clover-characters.p.rapidapi.com/c"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "black-clover-characters.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
